data.title: Wheelers for Schools
data.meta_description: Wheelers provides an entire world of books in a few clicks. We are the largest supplier of books to Public Libraries and Schools in Australasia. We have the most extensive book database of any library supplier in the world, with unique online tools that compare the availability of print books worldwide to bring you the lowest prices with confirmed availability.
data.text:
Sarah Kirsch (Trade Paperback)

Edited by: Hopwood, Mererid

0

0

This volume combines a general introduction, an in-depth study of, an interview with, and five original poems by German poet, Sarah Kirsch. Five essays by different Germanists focus on various aspects of Kirsch's work - from the structure and style of her poems and prose to their thematic content. A bibliography and biography are also included in the book.
